remarks: If a convergent function has its values in a Hausdorff space, then it has a unique limit.  (Contributed by FL, 14-Nov-2010.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
hausflf.x $e |- X = U. J $.
hausflf2 $p |- ( ( ( J e. Haus /\ L e. ( Fil ` Y ) /\ F : Y --> X ) /\ ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) =/= (/) ) -> ( ( J fLimf L ) ` F ) ~~ 1o ) $.
